title: CollabBoard
description: A real-time collaborative whiteboard app for team communication with drawing tools, chat, live audio/video, and synced rooms.

title: DigiAsset
description: A decentralized platform for minting, buying, and selling Digital Assets with MetaMask integration and IPFS storage.

title: JobPortal
description: A full-stack platform connecting job seekers and employers with job posting, filtering, CRUD operations, and secure authentication.
